text: braqhmaqvAqdinO# vadantyatirAqtraH pa#raqmO ya#j~jakratUqnAM kasmAqt taM pra#thaqmamupa# yaqntItyEqtadvA a#gniShTOqmaM pra#thaqmamupa# yaqntyathOqkthya#matha# ShODaqSinaq-mathA#tirAqtra-ma#nupUqrvamEqvaitad-ya#j~jakraqtUnuqpEtyaq tAnAqlaBya# pariqgRuhyaq sOma#mEqvaitat piba#nta AsatEq jyOti#ShTOmaM prathaqmamupa# yantiq jyOti#ShTOmOq vai stOmA#nAqM muKa#M muKaqta Eqva stOmAqn pra yu#~jjatEq tE - [  ] 32
